source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenery shot captures a powerful thunderstorm at night. Lightning flashes within a large, dark cloud, illuminating it with a purple glow against a starry sky. Faint city lights can be seen on the distant horizon below the storm.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenery shot captures a powerful thunderstorm at night. Lightning flashes within a large, dark cloud, illuminating it with a purple glow against a starry sky. Faint city lights can be seen on the distant horizon below the storm.

generated_critique: The caption incorrectly treats this time-lapse video as a static scenery shot and fails to describe the primary motion. The main action is the storm cloud dissipating over time. The description should be revised to chronologically detail how the large storm cloud, illuminated by internal lightning, gradually shrinks and fades away until it disappears from the night sky.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This time-lapse video shows a powerful thunderstorm dissipating at night. Initially, a large storm cloud is illuminated from within by flashes of purple lightning against a starry sky. As the video progresses, the cloud gradually shrinks and fades away, with the lightning flashes becoming less frequent. The storm eventually vanishes completely, leaving only the dark night sky and faint city lights visible on the distant horizon.
